name: codegen-cpp
description: Facilitates writing C++ by generating stub definitions from header files

codegen-cpp.FileHeader.ForC++Source.description: File header which is added at the top of each generated C++ source file. Each element of the configuration value represents a new line.

codegen-cpp.FileHeader.ForC++Header.description: File header which is added at the top of each generated C++ header file. Each element of the configuration value represents a new line.

codegen-cpp.OutputFileExtension.ForC++So.description: File extension used when generating C++ source files

codegen-cpp.OutputFileExtension.ForC++He.description: File extension used when generating C++ header files

codegen-cpp.deduceOutputFileNames.markdownDescription:
Whether the output file name(s) should be deduced when generating:
* Source from Header: by keeping the base name
* Interface implementations: by using the name of the (first) implementation 


 Else the file base name has to be entered via the UI.

enumDescriptions: Disables the directory selector and created files are put in the directory of the root file.
Uses a quick pick selector with fuzzy find
codegen-cpp.OutputDirectorySelector.Mode.description: Sets how the output directory of generated files can be selected.

codegen-cpp.OutputDirectorySelector.Igno.description: Relative directory paths which are ignored for selection (anymatch-compatible definition). Needs a window reload to be applied.

codegen-cpp.OutputDirectorySelector.UseG.markdownDescription: Extracts ignored directories from the `.gitignore` file if available. Needs a window reload to be applied, as well when `.gitignore` is changed.

commands.title: codegen-cpp: Generate source file from header
codegen-cpp:  Generate interface implementation source/header files

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
